title: Enhancing Teaching Methodology Competencies: Experiential Learning in Mathematical Applications through Virtual Business Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics (statistics, calculus) and proficiency in data analysis tools
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematical models and perform decision-making simulations using virtual business data.
Learners can systematically organize a data-driven problem-solving process into three or more stages through collaboration with team members.
Learners can self-assess project outcomes at least twice and develop improvement plans using learning analytics tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
